newsitem.title: USA: Nu-kote sees Q4 loss from charges.
newsitem.headline: Nu-kote sees Q4 loss from charges.

text.p: Nu-kote Holding Inc said on Thursday it expects to post restructuring charges for the fourth quarter ended March 31, which will result in an operating loss for the quarter.
The charges are related to inventory, property write-offs and severance payments from an accelerated restructuring program, Nu-kote said.
The size of the charges and operating loss were not immediately available.
Nu-kote also said it expects fiscal fourth quarter sales to be higher than the $82.9 million in sales reported for the fiscal third quarter ended December 27, 1996.
Nu-kote's restructuring is on schedule and it will help the company's earnings in the future, it said.
In last year's fourth quarter, the company reported sales of $112.5 million and net income of $4.4 million, or $0.19 a share.
Nu-kote has not completed the figuring of the fourth quarter results, but a spokeswoman said it is likely that the loss will take place before the charges are factored.
